item.description:
Please join me to see David Johnston at Toad. I see this guy fairly often playing outside in Havard Square with a steel guitar and I think he's pretty good. He tends to play a lot of blues, roots and folk.

I plan to get there around 9ish, but feel free to come and go as you please. David Johnston starts at 10pm.

Emily White plays before David Johnston, from 7pm to 10pm. I may try to go earlier than 9pm to hear more of her, but no guarantees.

Check out Toad's website for more info:

http://www.toadcambri...

Check out this website for more info on David Johnston:

http://cdbaby.com/cd/...

Check out this website for more info on Emily White:

http://www.myspace.co...

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a green tye-dye shirt and I'll email my cell phone # to the people who reply yes and maybe.
item.name: David Johnston at Toad
